subject: Keep your reciepts - RS 12-469/470!
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text: Hi All, I'm going to open up my RS 12-469 (AM/FM) today, to see if it has the removable "Pin" to be modified, if not . . .  I'll put it all back together and return it to RS for a refund! Hope I can modify it, though. 8-)   =Judy=
